dict.string:
,

I just joined this new social network with fresh new features!

Click here to go to the Apple AppStore and search for Tellem

After you install the app, log in using Instagram or your email. Then we can connect!

Thanks!
. Join my new social network! Download the app Tellem at the Apple AppStore at http://appstore.com. After you install the app, log in using Instagram or your email. Then we can connect! Thanks!
